summary: Multi-language application with i18n support (Turkish, English, etc.)
architectural_notes: Multi-language support using i18n (Turkish, English, etc.)
I18nProvider must wrap the App component correctly
known_issues: useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider error occurring after recent updates

new_feature_requests.summary: Wrap the App component with I18nProvider in frontend/src/main.tsx to resolve the 'useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider' error
Ensure I18nProvider is imported from frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx in main.tsx
Verify that the component hierarchy in main.tsx correctly places I18nProvider between QueryClientProvider and App component
